item.title: vRA 7.x vs vRA 8.x - Which Version to Deploy?
item.description: VMware has recently released vRealize Automation 8.0 and with this comes a complete redesign of the vRealize Automation product. Are you just starting out on your Cloud Management Platform (CMP) journey and not quite sure which version to deploy? Hopefully this blog will help you understand some of the key differences between vRA 7.x and vRA 8.x and some familiar features which are missing from vRA 8.x. The first place to start is by reading this excellent blog post by Chip Zoller (daphnissov) on the VMware Community Forums.
